author: Shibani Mahtani
title: O’Hare Airport Nears Deal for $8.5 Billion Expansion
text:
CHICAGO—Chicago officials and major airlines including United and American are in final stages of negotiating an $8.5 billion expansion of O’Hare International Airport, the country’s third busiest airport by passenger traffic, according to people familiar with the discussions.
The planned modernization, which will include adding dozens of new gates, rebuilding the international terminal and renovating three other terminals, is expected to take eight years and represents the largest revamp of O’Hare in its 73-year history....
